1280: In addition to our limit of liability, we will pay on behalf of an "insured"
1281: 1. Up to $250 for the cost of bail bonds required because of an accident, including related traffic law violations. The accident must result in "bodily injury" or "property damage" covered under this policy
1282: 2. Premiums on appeal bonds and bonds to release attachments in any suit we defend.
1283: 3. Interest accruing after a judgment is entered in any suit we defend. Our duty to pay interest ends when we offer to pay that part of the judgment which does not exceed our limit of liability for this coverage.
1284: 4. Up to $200 a day for loss of earnings, but not other income, because of attendance at hearings or trials at our request.
1285: 5. Other reasonable expenses incurred at our request.
